label: Children's Toys and Games
description: Toys and games for children of all ages.
intents: Find age-appropriate toys for my child
Discover new games for my child to play
Buy popular toys for my child's birthday or holiday

subcategories.label: Action Figures
subcategories.description: Poseable figures of popular characters from movies, TV shows, and video games.

subcategories.label: Building Sets
subcategories.description: Construction toys that allow children to build and create their own structures and designs.

subcategories.label: Dolls and Accessories
subcategories.description: Realistic and imaginative dolls for children to play with, along with clothing and accessories.

subcategories.label: Electronic Toys
subcategories.description: Toys that incorporate technology, such as robots, drones, and interactive pets.

subcategories.label: Outdoor Toys
subcategories.description: Toys and games for outdoor play, such as sports equipment, ride-on toys, and water toys.

subcategories.label: Board Games and Puzzles
subcategories.description: Games and puzzles that can be played with friends and family, either competitively or cooperatively.

subcategories.label: Arts and Crafts
subcategories.description: Supplies and kits for creative activities, such as drawing, painting, and jewelry-making.

subcategories.label: Educational Toys
subcategories.description: Toys and games that teach children about science, math, language, and other subjects.

subcategories.label: Vehicles and Playsets
subcategories.description: Toys that feature vehicles, such as cars, trucks, and trains, along with playsets for them to interact with.

subcategories.label: Role-Playing Toys
subcategories.description: Toys that allow children to pretend and act out different roles and scenarios, such as dress-up clothes and play kitchens.
